result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: Jamie was at the end of his seventh year of age.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
